name: Rat Soup
description:
Note from developers:

Dear Rat Collectors,

Our game will get an update somewhere next week.  Be aware that our current system is a WIP (Work in Progress)

At the moment one rat makes one soup.

some features in our upcoming update:

-More rats! 

-Updated Minigame

-Finished Combo system (more rats in one soup makes a new soup)

A combination Never seen before between rats and soups.

Combine to create new combinations

Strive to fill your own book of Ratferences. 

Dive into the magical world of rats and soups, in this world there is ongoing research for everything.

Many choose the safe path researching simple subjects and safe subjects. But not you, you have a burning passion for the nature of rats, The fact that they eat everything. After stumbling on a small workshop with a cauldron and the book of ratferences, you feel that you have finally found your subject of research. Rats.

 In this workshop you find some notes, these notes describe a mysterious way of developing new sorts of rats. This happens through the use soup which has been created by adding rats to the broth.

 Key Features:

·Many different kinds of rats: through adding rats to the cauldron and feeding rats different soups you can discover new soups and rats.

· Complete your book of Ratferences: Every new rat and soup will be written down in your book of Ratferences. Discover all sort of rare rats. You might even discover the legendary rats.

· Whack a rat: During the cooking process, you need to tap the rats to make sure they don’t escape the cauldron. Make sure to not let any rat escape and successfully make new combinations.
